voiceChecklistDescription: Speak your tasks, or type them in. Get organized effortlessly!
emptyChecklistSubMessage: Use your voice or type to add tasks!
footerText: © {year} Voice Checklist App. Built with Next.js and AI.
microphonePermissionDeniedError: Microphone permission denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
itemsAddedToastDescription: {count} new item(s) added to your checklist.
noChecklistItemsFoundDescription: AI couldn't identify specific commands or new tasks in your speech.
itemDeletedToastDescription: The item has been removed from your checklist.
emptyTranscriptionDescription: Could not detect any speech. Please try again.
noCommandsOrItemsFoundDescription: Couldn't understand any commands or new items from your speech.
voiceCommandsModalDescription: Here are some examples of voice commands you can use:
commandAddExample1: Say: "Add milk", "Put eggs on the list"
commandAddExample2: Or just list items: "Apples, bananas, bread"
commandToggleExample2: Or just say an existing item's name: "Milk"
itemTextCannotBeEmptyDescription: Item text cannot be empty. Edit cancelled.
